at.ac.tuwien.infosys.jcloudscale.vm

Interface IHost

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IMigrationEnabledVirtualHost, IVirtualHost
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EC2Instance, LocalVM, OpenStackInstance, VirtualHost

    public interface IHost
    Specifies the cloud host proxy and the set of user-available operations on the cloud host.
    Author:
    RST

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClientCloudObject getCloudObjectById(UUID objectId)
      Gets the cloud objects with the specified id deployed to this host.
      Iterable<ClientCloudObject> getCloudObjects()
      Gets the collection of the cloud objects deployed on this machine.
      int getCloudObjectsCount()
      Gets the amount of the cloud objects deployed on this cloud host.
      CPUUsage getCurrentCPULoad()
      If monitoring is enabled, gets the last measurement of the CPU load on this machine.
      RAMUsage getCurrentRAMUsage()
      If monitoring is enabled, gets the last measurement of the memory usage on this machine.
      UUID getId()
      Gets the unique identifier of the host.
      String getIpAddress()
      Gets the IP address of the host.
      Date getLastRequestTime()
      Gets the last request time for this host.
      Date getStartupTime()
      Gets the startup time of the cloud host.
      boolean isOnline()
      Allows to determine if the cloud host is online or not.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        UUID getId()
        Gets the unique identifier of the host.
        Returns:
        The UUID that uniquely identifies this host.

      • getIpAddress

        String getIpAddress()
        Gets the IP address of the host.
        Returns:
        The String that specifies the IP address of the host.

      • getStartupTime

        Date getStartupTime()
        Gets the startup time of the cloud host.
        Returns:
        The Date that identifies the startup time of the cloud host.

      • isOnline

        boolean isOnline()
        Allows to determine if the cloud host is online or not.

      • getLastRequestTime

        Date getLastRequestTime()
        Gets the last request time for this host.
        Returns:
        The Date that identifies the time when there was last interaction with this host.

      • getCloudObjects

        Iterable<ClientCloudObject> getCloudObjects()
        Gets the collection of the cloud objects deployed on this machine.
        Returns:
        The collection of the cloud objects that are deployed on this cloud host.

      • getCloudObjectById

        ClientCloudObject getCloudObjectById(UUID objectId)
        Gets the cloud objects with the specified id deployed to this host.
        Parameters:
        objectId - The id of the cloud object.
        Returns:
        The ClientCloudObject instance or null if object with the specified id was not found.

      • getCloudObjectsCount

        int getCloudObjectsCount()
        Gets the amount of the cloud objects deployed on this cloud host.
        Returns:
        The positive int or 0 that determines the amount of cloud objects currently deployed on this cloud host.

      • getCurrentCPULoad

        CPUUsage getCurrentCPULoad()
        If monitoring is enabled, gets the last measurement of the CPU load on this machine. Otherwise returns null.
        Returns:
        A complex value returning some basic load metrics of the CPU. Values are averages of the last 1-minute interval

      • getCurrentRAMUsage

        RAMUsage getCurrentRAMUsage()
        If monitoring is enabled, gets the last measurement of the memory usage on this machine. Otherwise returns null.
        Returns:
        A complex value containing the max, free and used memory of the host JVM process at measurement time.
